name: Your Life Counts
description:
Description

The life is full of choice and all your life choices has consequences. This game is about your life choices. So how do you want to live your life?  

Controls

All you need to play the game is a mouse and a keyboard. The controls in this game is a simple point and click game.

Keyboard shortcuts

R: Restart the game

M: Mute the music (I would recommend you to mute the music)

Escape: Quit the game

Good luck and have fun

This is a very early version of the game, so expect bugs and a lot of misspellings .
